query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employees) as total_funcionarios,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employees WHERE active = 1 AND status = 'ativo') as funcionarios_ativos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as total_usuarios,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE role = 'admin') as usuarios_admin,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE role = 'gestor') as usuarios_gestor,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE role = 'colaborador') as usuarios_colaborador,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employees WHERE userId IS NOT NULL) as funcionarios_com_usuario
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2zjpxFGuGsCP7jR.root --database Vd5BJ8toX8cUC4zST6itFN --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employees) as total_funcionarios,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employees WHERE active = 1 AND status = 'ativo') as funcionarios_ativos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as total_usuarios,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE role = 'admin') as usuarios_admin,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE role = 'gestor') as usuarios_gestor,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE role = 'colaborador') as usuarios_colaborador,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employees WHERE userId IS NOT NULL) as funcionarios_com_usuario
